'''Rosa Baggins''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Rosa was the daughter of [[Ponto Baggins I|Ponto Baggins]] and [[Mimosa Bunce]]. She married [[Hildigrim Took]], son of [[Gerontius Took|the Old Took]]. They had only one child, [[Adalgrim Took|Adalgrim]], born in {{SR|1280|n}}.<ref>{{App|Took}}</ref>

==Etymology==
[http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/rosa#Latin Rosa] is the Latin name for the [[Rose (disambiguation)|rose]].
